text: Kevin Patrick Curran (February 27, 1957 â€“ October 25, 2016) was an American television comedy writer. He is best known for writing for Late Night with David Letterman, Married... with Children and The Simpsons. He had 20 Emmy Award nominations to his name. Curran was born in Hartford, Connecticut. He was in a relationship with British author Helen Fielding from 1999 until his own death in 2016. The couple had two children. On October 25, 2016, Curran died of cancer in West Hollywood, California. He was 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American television writers Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles County, California Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:Writers from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Kevin Curran (writer)
